pr_title: BLUEBUTTON-1281: Bring MGMT into parity and pass CI

timeline.message: Bringing mgmt into parity with other envs and CI passing

timeline.bodyText: Changing from a General Purpose to a Compute Optimized is intentional, I assume?
timeline.author: cthulhuplus

replies.bodyText: Yeah that is part of the app build optimization to reduce deploy times: https://jira.cms.gov/browse/BLUEBUTTON-1579
replies.author: njdister
